description: A staple of science fiction for decades, virtual and augmented reality technologies have begun to make their way into our own hands – experts estimate that by 2020, the VR and AR industry will be worth 150+ billion dollars. New content and devices are being released daily, resulting in an entirely new shift in the way we interact with technology. In this talk, we’ll cover what it’s like to find a path and navigate through the new frontier of modern computing within the virtual and augmented reality industry, and and how 3D immersive computing is already impacting industries around the globe.
title: Exploring New Frontiers of Tech – Using Virtual Reality for More than Games
